SummaryEnglish: Linny the guinea pig, Tuck the turtle, and Ming-Ming the duckling are class pets in a schoolhouse. When they are left alone in the classroom after each school day ends, they wait for a special phone to ring and alert them to an animal in trouble. The Wonder Pets must save the day and teamwork is their main tool! They travel around the world --- visiting such varied locales as Egypt and Hawaii --- and even imaginary storybook worlds. Packed with tons of fun and catchy lyrics and instrumentals, brought to you by the same people behind award-winning Broadway shows such as Avenue Q.

1.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets travel to Hawaii to save a Young Dolphin who has gotten caught in a fisherman's net.

2.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets rig their Flyboat for space travel and head for the stars to rescue a Baby Chimp who is adrift in a rocket ship.

3.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets must save a unicorn that got her horn stuck in a tree in Fairytale Land.

4.SummaryEnglish: The Pets try to help a baby penguin who is stuck on an iceberg and is floating away.

5.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets save a pair of brother and sister sea lions who are playing a game of tug-of-war too close to the water.

6.SummaryEnglish: The Pets reunite a joey with his mother.

7.SummaryEnglish: Linny, Tuck, and Ming-Ming try to help an inchworm understand what is going on when he friend, the caterpillar, starts his journey into becoming a butterfly.

8.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets rescue a baby crane who is stuck in his nest too close to a volcano.

9.SummaryEnglish: When no pets need to be saved Ming-Ming goes out in search of pets to rescue and soon learns that she is the one who needs to be rescued.

10.SummaryEnglish: The Pets must save a kitten who is floating on a piece of drift wood in Italy.

11.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets must save the pigeon from the nose of the Statue of Liberty.

12.SummaryEnglish: Linny, Tuck and Ming-Ming must work as a team to free the baby dinosaur that is wedged between two rocks.

13.SummaryEnglish: Linny, Tuck, and Ming-Ming try to save a calf that is caught in a tornado.

14.SummaryEnglish: The Pets save a skunk from a thorny rosebush.

15.SummaryEnglish: Linny, Tuck and Ming-Ming try to save the baby swan who has a fear of dancing.

16.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets must show the puppy how to use the new puppy door so he can do potty outside.

17.SummaryEnglish: Linny, Tuck and Ming-Ming try to save a dying tree that is in need of water.

18.SummaryEnglish: The Pets save an elephant whose trunk is stuck in the mud.

19.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets save a panda that is trapped in a bamboo tree.

20.SummaryEnglish: The Pets save a mouse that is stuck in the attic of the school.

21.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets lead a baby camel that is thirsty to his oasis.

22.SummaryEnglish: Then the Wonder Pets try to stop two different armies of ants from fighting at a picnic.

23.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets rescue a baby hedgehog inside a topiary.

24.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets visit a crocodile with a toothache.

25.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets help an elderly bullfrog.

26.SummaryEnglish: Then the Wonder Pets must rescue a poodle from the top of the Eiffel Tower.

27.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets must stop a herd of sheep before they fall off the cliff.

28.SummaryEnglish: The Pets go on a vacation to Cancun, Mexico. While they are there, they discover a hermit crab that's in need of a new shell and decide to help out.

29.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets receive a request for help from a kitten trapped inside a haunted doghouse.

30.TitleEnglish: Save the Yak, the Pig, and the Dancing Bear!
30.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets help a group of performing animals that have floated away in a hot air balloon.

31.SummaryEnglish: Linny, Ming-Ming, and Tuck must save one of Santa's reindeer that is stuck on the ice in the North Pole. They make a net out of Ming Ming's sweater and reel the baby reindeer in. Once they save the reindeer she ends up running away because she doesn't have the confidence to think she is good enough to help pull Santa's sleigh.

32.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets join the world of fairy tale theater when they receive a call from The Three Little Pigs. The pigs are faced with a big, bad wolf who is trying to blow down their homes.

33.SummaryEnglish: Linny, Tuck and Ming Ming travel to Oregon to save an owl who is lost in the forrest.

34.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets set out to rescue a sea creature who lives underwater, but end up being swallowed by a giant whale, and need to be rescued themselves.  A puffer fish, seahorse and squid come to their aid.

35.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets must work together to save a baby goldfish in an aquarium is trapped inside a bubbling treasure chest.

36.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets assist a group of baby birds in finding a perch.

1.SummaryEnglish: When Tuck dreams of being somewhere other than the classroom, he ends up stuck on a coral reef. Ming-Ming and Linny must venture to the Caribbean to save him. It's a relaxing, sunny place, but they do their best to keep their minds on the job.

2.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets once again travel to the puppet theater, this time to save Little Red Riding Hood. The Big Bad Wolf is chasing her, but she doesn't believe she's in any danger. The wolf acts as if he's friendly to trick her, while secretly plotting to eat both her and her grandmother.

3.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets receive a call for rescue from an egg and travel to Yellowstone Park. There, they face obstacles such as a mischievous prairie dog and a gushing geyser. As they cope with the unique difficulties of trying to save an egg, they also wonder the whole time just what type of animal the egg contains.

4.SummaryEnglish:
When a baby flamingo is trapped in a muddy pit, the Wonder Pets most fly into a 
colorig book to save him. This colorful world provides an exciting adventure for the Wonder Pets, who face the challenge of rescuing the flamingo without being trapped themselves.

5.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets must shrink to the size of bees to help one who is having trouble making nectar. When she has problems with flying, they try to help her learn. Everyone discovers the value of practice.

6.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets receive a call from a squirrel who is trapped on a ferris wheel at Coney Island. When they free the squirrel from the wheel, they discover that it seems to be lost, but is reluctant to ask for help. They enjoy the delights of Coney Island as they try to persuade the squirrel.

7.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets travel to the island of Madagascar to save a chameleon from a cuckoo hawk. Along the way, they try new ways of doing things and learn about the concept of camouflage.

8.SummaryEnglish: When Ming-Ming pays a visit to Tuck's cage, she messes with his things, causing him to declare he's not speaking to her. Not impressed, Ming-Ming begins a silent treatment of her own. Nevertheless, the two must still work together to help a platypus stuck on a river in Australia.

9.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets return to the Magical Land seen in Save the Unicorn! to rescue the baby dragon. The dragon is trapped on a cloud that is rapidly shrinking. They have to figure out a way for him to get down without getting hurt.

10.SummaryEnglish: A beaver in Vermont needs help when her dam springs a leak. The Wonder Pets must figure out how to stop it before her home is destroyed.

11.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets help Canadian Geese to fly south.

12.SummaryEnglish: Ollie, the bunny who once joined the Pets on a rescue, sets up his own animal-rescue service.

13.SummaryEnglish: A ladybug is trapped in a venus flytrap and it's up to the Wonder Pets to set her free.

14.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets head to Japan to help a lost Sea Turtle that is looking for the sea.

15.SummaryEnglish: A drawing of a special Pangaroo, which is part parrot and part kangaroo, is throw in the garbage can and it needs the Wonder Pets to retreive it.

16.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets head to Chicago to help a cricket that becomes trapped in a soap bubble.

17.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets must save a baby armadillo because he thinks that the old West town that he lives in is haunted.

18.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets help a distraught spider that keeps being flushed down the waterspout in a painting.

19.SummaryEnglish: In an 1970's pop Beatles theme, the Wonder Pets must figure out a way to save four beetles that have become trapped in seaweed in their yellow submarine in Liverpool, while they are inside their submarine.

20.TitleEnglish: Three Wonder Pets and a Baby!
20.SummaryEnglish: A piglet needs the Wonder Pets' help really close to home...in the schoolhouse.

21.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets are followed home from Costa Rica by a baby Gecko.

22.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets use clues to figure out what animal needs to be rescued after their phone breaks.

23.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets travel to medieval times as knights, to save a griffin who's tail is caught under a rock.

24.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets must help a rooster get his crow back.

25.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets go under the ground to visit Ollie because Ming Ming is afraid to go alone.

26.SummaryEnglish: An alien is in danger of being trapped on earth if the Wonder Pets can't get him out in time.

27.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets help a baby blowfish off to her first day at her new preschool.

28.SummaryEnglish: Then Wonder Pets set out to reunite a lost parrot with his pirate friends in a clay diaroma so they can find the buried treasure.

29.SummaryEnglish: In this primetime one hour special episode, the Wonder Pets come to the aid of a bengal tiger after he won't let a mouse help him get a painful thorn out of his foot, because he thinks the mouse is too small.

30.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets follow Mouse King through the winter wonderland filled with dolls, fairies, and music, so they can get back their nutcracker gift.

31.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets help Sammy and his Rats learn the importance of teamwork.

32.TitleEnglish: Save the Fiddler Crab on the Roof!
32.SummaryEnglish: The team save a Fiddler Crab in Russia that has become trapped on a house's roof.

33.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets join the circus.

34.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets try to free an old white mouse after he gets stuck in a cuckoo clock.

35.TitleEnglish: The Adventures of Bee and Slug
35.SummaryEnglish: Then the wonder pets come to the aid of a slug and a little bee after they lose control of the fly boat.

36.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets rescue a baby hound dog that has become trapped in a mansion in Memphis.

1.SummaryEnglish: When the Flyboat breaks down, the pets must use recycled materials to create a new one.

2.SummaryEnglish: The Pets travel to Scotland to help the infamous Loch Ness Monster.

3.TitleEnglish: Save the Cool Cat and the Hip Hippo!
3.SummaryEnglish: Cool Cat and Hip Hippo both love performing, but at the same time, so The Wonder Pets show them how to work together.

4.SummaryEnglish: Tuck gets jealous of Buck's skateboarding ability.

5.SummaryEnglish: The Pets try to help a mermaid who wants to become a pirate.

6.SummaryEnglish: The Pets help a young pony make her first delivery as part of the Pony Express.

7.SummaryEnglish: The Pets must convince a pair of bears to share a pot of honey with each other.

8.SummaryEnglish: The team tries to teach a stinkbug about bathing.

9.SummaryEnglish: Ollie vanishes in a magician's hat and it's up to the Wonder Pets to find him.

10.SummaryEnglish: A baby mouse is breaking all her toys during a temper tantrum, so it's up to the wonder pets to find a way to calm her down.

11.SummaryEnglish: The Pets' home movie is interrupted when they discover a baby mouse stuck in the projector.

12.SummaryEnglish: The pets travel to Tanzania to help a baby rhino find a friend.

14.TitleEnglish: Help the Cow Jump Over the Moon!
14.SummaryEnglish: The Pets get a call from a young cow who is having trouble jumping over the moon.

15.SummaryEnglish: The Pets travel to Transylvania to help a baby bat who is afraid of the dark.

17.SummaryEnglish: The Pets try to reunite a pair of quarreling lovebugs on Valentine's Day.

18.SummaryEnglish: A Skunk Rocker asks the Pets to help him find a band.

19.SummaryEnglish: The pets help Ollie fill in when the Easter Bunny is sick with a cold.

20.SummaryEnglish: The Pets travel to space to attend the Visitor's birthday party.

21.SummaryEnglish: Linny tells Tuck, Ming-Ming and Ollie the story of how the Wonder Pets first got started.

24.SummaryEnglish: In this film noir episode, narrated by Linny, the Wonder Pets must help a Fox whose diamond-studded collar has mysteriously disappeared.

25.TitleEnglish: Teach the Old Dog New Tricks!
25.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets go to see a vaudeville show and meet an Old Dog performer.

26.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets get a call from Humpty Dumpty who is teetering precariously on a wall in a pop-up book.

27.SummaryEnglish: The team must show a colony of Meerkats the joys of voting when they can't agree on how to handle a lurking Jackal.

28.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets travel to Cape Cod to help a trapped Lobster free himself before the trap is raised.

29.SummaryEnglish: Floppy the Elephant comes to the classroom for a sleepover with Tuck. The Wonder Pets must help Floppy when he gets homesick.

31.TitleEnglish: Save the Moose in the Caboose!
31.SummaryEnglish: Ming-Ming draws a colorful story about a Moose stuck in a caboose that's headed for a cliff!

32.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets travel to Mount Everest where, with the help of a Goat sherpa, they save an endangered Baby Snow Leopard.

33.SummaryEnglish: Ming-Ming brings the whole team to Kalamazoo when she is asked to watch Marvin.

34.SummaryEnglish: Bee and Slug get stuck in some gooey mud when they decide to explore what life is like underground.

35.SummaryEnglish: Ming-Ming flies through the shrink machine the wrong way and becomes enormous!

36.SummaryEnglish: In this swinging Andrews Sisters-style show, the Wonder Pets get a phone call from Little Bo Peep, who's lost her three singing Sheep.

38.SummaryEnglish: A dalmatian is scared to slide down a fire pole.

41.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets get caught in a tornado and blown to the magical Land of Oz!

42.SummaryEnglish: The Wonder Pets get a call from a Genie whose lamp has been dented beyond repair. The team flies out to a storybook Arabian desert and rubs the Genie's lamp, setting him free. He thanks the Wonder Pets and grants them each a wish for rescuing him.
